headline: 5 Dividends That Beat Social Security’s Unpredictable COLA Adjustments
summary: Social Security’s cost-of-living adjustments swing wildly year to year. The 2025 COLA came in at 2.5%, down from 3.2% in 2024 and 8.7% in 2023. For retirees counting on predictable income growth, this volatility creates planning challenges. The solution lies in dividend stocks that deliver consistent income growth regardless of Social Security. These five stocks ... 5 Dividends That Beat Social Security’s Unpredictable COLA Adjustments
